name: Explorator: Sacrifice
description:
"Emergency Evacuation! Everyone through the portal now!"

You find yourself on a decrepit spaceship, locked on a fixed course. Can you scavenge for supplies from the worlds it passes by in order to keep it going?

Instructions

  • Keep 'Supplies' 'Components' and 'Chemicals' above zero else the ship will break down and you'll die!
  • When the portal opens, go through it to travel to a world with one of these resources on
  • The available resource is viewable on the plinth next to the portal
  • Gather them and get back to the portal before the time runs out, else you'll be left behind!

Controls

  • W,A,S,D or Left stick to move
  • E or 'X' button to interact
  • Shift or Left stick press to toggle sprint
  • Space or 'A' button to jump

Download for windows, or click here to play

Assets Used

  • The U.I elements were from Unity's UI samples pack
  • The models, etc. were from Synty Studios' Low poly Sci-Fi range, mainly the spaceand world packs
